auth.emailVerificationSuccess: Email verified successfully! You can now log in.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successfully! You can now log in with your new password.
auth.passwordMismatch: Passwords do not match. Please check and try again.

auth.logoutFailed: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

quiz.title: Test Title
quiz.sentencePlaceholder: Enter the sentence that should have hidden words here

delete.title: Delete Quiz?
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete ""? This action cannot be undone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account Forever?
deleteAccount.message: Are you absolutely sure? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently lost.
deleteAccount.quizzes: All your saved quizzes and questions
deleteAccount.error: Account deletion failed. Please contact support for assistance.

success.title: Welcome to QuizMaster Pro!
success.description: You're all set! You will be redirected to the quiz editor to start creating amazing quizzes.

login.title: Welcome Back!
login.description: Log in to your QuizMaster Pro account
login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up

forgotPassword.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.backToLogin: Remember your password? Log In
forgotPassword.success: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
forgotPassword.userNotFound: This email is not registered. Please sign up first.

resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.invalidToken: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset successfully!

signup.title: Join QuizMaster Pro!
signup.description: Create your account and start creating amazing quizzes
signup.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters
signup.hasAccount: Already have an account? Log In

emailVerification.title: Verify Your Email Address
emailVerification.message: Thank you for signing up! We've sent a verification email to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
emailVerification.tip1: Check your spam/junk folder if you don't see the email
emailVerification.tip2: The verification link expires in 24 hours
emailVerification.tip3: Make sure to click the link in the email to complete verification
emailVerification.resendError: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.
emailVerification.verificationRequired: Email verification required. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.missingAnswers: Cannot run test: {count} multiple choice question(s) missing correct answer. Please select a correct answer for each highlighted question.

modal.supabaseNotInitialized: Supabase client not initialized. Please refresh the page.
modal.noQuestions: Please add at least one question before saving quiz.
modal.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them before leaving?
modal.unsavedProjectMessage: Your current project has not been saved yet. If you leave this page, your work will be lost. Would you like to save your project first?

testRunner.errorLoading: Error loading test data. Please try again.
testRunner.noTestData: No test data found. Please create a test first.
testRunner.noQuestions: No questions available in this test.
testRunner.noScorableQuestions: No scorable questions available in this test (all questions are typing questions).

changeDisplayName.title: Change Display Name
changeDisplayName.description: Update your name as it appears across the platform

profile.displayNameHint: Display name must be 3-20 characters long

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Secure your account with a new password

profile.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface
languageSettings.languageHint: Language preference will be saved and applied across all pages

hero.title: Create Professional Quizzes in Minutes
hero.subtitle: The ultimate platform for educators, trainers, and content creators to design, manage, and deliver engaging multiple-choice assessments.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Assessment
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create engaging and effective quizzes

multipleQuestionTypes.title: Multiple Question Types
multipleQuestionTypes.description: Support for multiple choice, true/false, fill-in-the-blank, and matching questions with rich text and image support.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Real-time scoring and detailed analytics to track performance and identify knowledge gaps.

saveManage.title: Save & Manage
saveManage.description: Organize your quizzes with our intuitive management system. Save, edit, and reuse assessments anytime.

pdfExport.title: PDF Export
pdfExport.description: Generate professional PDF documents with customizable layouts for printing and distribution.

richMedia.title: Rich Media Support
richMedia.description: Embed images, diagrams, and visual content directly into your questions for enhanced learning.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Create and take quizzes on any device. Our platform works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

classroom.title: Perfect for Interactive Classroom Desks
classroom.subtitle: Transform your classroom into an engaging learning environment with our interactive quiz platform

interactiveDisplay.title: Interactive Display Ready
interactiveDisplay.description: Optimized for smart boards, interactive displays, and classroom technology. Students can participate directly from their seats or at the main display.

realTimeEngagement.title: Real-Time Engagement
realTimeEngagement.description: Instant feedback and live results keep students engaged. Watch participation soar as students see their answers and rankings in real-time.

assessmentFly.title: Assessment on the Fly
assessmentFly.description: Create quick quizzes during lessons to check understanding. Perfect for formative assessment and identifying learning gaps immediately.

classroomAnalytics.title: Classroom Analytics
classroomAnalytics.description: Track class performance and individual student progress. Export detailed reports for parent conferences and administrative reviews.

multiDevice.title: Multi-Device Support
multiDevice.description: Students can join from tablets, laptops, or classroom computers. Seamless integration with existing classroom technology infrastructure.

schoolWide.title: School-Wide Implementation
schoolWide.description: Scale from single classroom to entire school districts. Admin controls and user management make it perfect for educational institutions.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Classroom?
cta.description: Join thousands of teachers already using QuizMaster Pro for interactive learning

about.title: Designed for Educators, Built for Excellence
about.description: QuizMaster Pro was created by educators who understand the challenges of modern assessment. We've combined powerful features with an intuitive interface to help you create professional quizzes that engage students and provide meaningful insights.
about.testimonial: "QuizMaster Pro has transformed how I create assessments. The intuitive interface and powerful features save me hours every week!"

footer.tagline: Empowering educators with modern assessment tools

passwordStrength.mustBe6Chars: Password must be at least 6 characters
